data.name: Personal Rocket
data.detailed_description:
Personal Rocket is a retro point-and-click adventure about paranoia and loneliness, the evils of capitalism and too much web surfing, the material world and the occult universe. Your typical postmodern blues.

THE STORY

Six months ago, Cole Fisher was fired from his job as a computer engineer at Cosmic X, a corporation devoted to the betterment of the human race, the pursuit of world peace and eventual space conquest. The reason? He found out what they’re really up to. It’s quite obvious, you know: they’re trying to take over the world.


Since then, Cole has been holed up in his apartment hacking his way through endless labyrinthine connections, gathering as much data as he can to expose the biggest conspiracy in human history.

And now, Cole has had a surreal vision, a religious experience, a close encounter, call it what you like. A Mysterious Messenger has told him it’s time to act and bring down Cosmic X once and for all. Or at least that’s his take on it.

data.short_description: A point-and-click adventure about paranoia and loneliness, the evils of capitalism and too much web surfing, the material world and the occult universe. Your typical postmodern blues.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 700 Mhz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux
  • Processor: 700 Mhz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Though they are not the main themes of the game, there are some references to suicide and drug use.
